snippet: A working paper issued before the recent Vatican plenary assembly on women offers a glimpse of the latest Catholic thinking about cosmetic surgery.
abstract: Mark Oppenheimer Beliefs column cites working paper issued before latest Vatican plenary assembly on women brings Catholic perspective to cosmetic surgery.
lead_paragraph: A working paper issued before the recent Vatican plenary assembly on women offers a glimpse of the latest Catholic thinking about cosmetic surgery.

headline.print_headline: Catholics, Plastic Surgery, and ‘the Feminine Self’
headline.main: Catholics, Plastic Surgery, and ‘the Truth of the Feminine Self’
